text: Kevin Marcus Ellison (January 8, 1987 â€“ , 2018) was an American football safety. He was born in Inglewood, California. He last played for the Seattle Seahawks of the National Football League. He was drafted by the San Diego Chargers in the sixth round of the 2009 NFL Draft. He played college football at Southern California. Ellison died in October 2018, according to the University of Southern California, at the age of 31. After his death, an autopsy revealed that Ellison had been suffering from Stage 2 chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). ==References== ==Other websites== *San Diego Chargers bio *USC Trojans football bio *Cathedral High School Phantom Football Category:1987 births Category:2018 deaths Category:African-American players of American football Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:Sportspeople from Inglewood, California
title: Kevin Ellison (American football)
